subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The last ball Brett Favre threw was intercepted by Giants cornerback Corey Webster. It now belongs to Greg Gadson, a United States Army lieutenant who lost his legs in May while serving in Iraq.
snippet: The last ball Brett Favre threw was intercepted by Giants cornerback Corey Webster. It now belongs to Greg Gadson, a United States Army lieutenant who lost his legs in May while serving in Iraq.
